meanings.definition: In a manner related to a hobby or secondary occupation.
meanings.sent1: She painted avocationally in the evenings after work.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed gardening avocationally on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched avocationally as the squirrel stole its treats.
meanings.sent4: Time flew avocationally as she immersed herself in her crafting projects.
meanings.sent5: The children played avocationally, pretending to be pirates on a homemade ship.
